name: Dragon Attack (raptor9999)
description: Greetings everyone and welcome to my admittedly short entry! With what time I had to work on this, I dedicated most of it to coming up with a smaller HP and damage based battle system, along with learning and experimenting A LOT with action sequences in RMMV. I am quite new to RPG Maker so this was mostly just practice and learning for me. Either way, I hope that you enjoy!
